text: The 1560s BC was a decade lasting from January 1, 1569 BC to December 31, 1560 BC. ==Events and trends== * 1567 BC—Egypt: End of Fifteenth Dynasty, end of Sixteenth Dynasty, end of Seventeenth Dynasty, start of Eighteenth Dynasty. ==Significant people== * Reuben, son of Jacob (1568–1445 BC)Hamodia. Nov/28/12. p. D47. * Ahmose I, Pharaoh and founder of the 18th Dynasty of Egypt (1570–1546 BC) == References ==
title: 1560s BC
